about_the_game:
Follow the story of Layla, a young witch with the power to control gravity. Together with the coven, she will fight against the threat that has returned once again to destroy the game. Up is down, left is right, it's all a matter of perspective.

Unravel her own memories and challenge her destiny, face formidable enemies and discover the meaning of justice and perseverance in this exciting supernatural adventure.
